Isha Sathsang
February, 2017
 

What you do is up to you, but you should do it consciously. That’s what it means to be human.

- Sadhguru

Monthly Group Meditation (Sathsang)
 

Dear {{FIRST_NAME}},

Isha Monthly Group Meditation is an opportunity to deepen your kriya with Sadhguru's voice guiding you through the Shambhavi Mahamudra Kriya. Here are the details of our upcoming Sathsang:
Date & Time: Sat, 11 Feb, 5pm - 7:15pm
Sydney
The Great Hall, Sydney Boys High School
11 Anzac parade, Moore Park, NSW 2021 (Enter Via Anzac Parade)
Melbourne
Multicultural Hub, 506 Elizabeth St, Melbourne
Brisbane
Slacks Creek Progress Hall, 151 - 153 Barbaralla Drive, Springwood
Perth
Corinthian Park Hall, Cnr Beatrice Ave & Leach Hwy, Shelley, WA, 6148

Please ensure that

  • you are on empty stomach
  • you are seated in the hall at least 15 minutes before the start time as late comers will not be permitted.

Inner engineering online participants
Please be outside the door not later than 35 minutes of start time to join the session after the Shambhavi practice.

* Please note that Sathsang will be conducted on the 2nd Saturday of every month across centres in Australia.

Mahashivratri Sadhana - Tools for Transformation
 

The Mahashivratri sadhana is a preparation for Mahashivratri – a night of tremendous possibilities. Anyone over the age of eight can participate in the sadhana, which can be done for a duration of either 40, 21, 14, 7 or 3 consecutive days leading up to Mahashivratri on February 24, 2017. You can still participate in this Sadhana; 14-day from Feb 11, 7-day from Feb 18, and 3-day from Feb 22.
